title: My Mom the Miracle: 1 Woman, 2 Cancers, 3 Years, 4-Ever Grateful
description: Could you imagine being told you have cancer, not only once, but twice? Two different cancers within a year. This is a story about my mom who embarked on a medical journey she never dreamed she would have to travel. The ups and downs of the two battles were like a roller coaster. She fought for her family and came out on top! This story provides insight on how to stay positive while fighting the deadly disease of cancer. It also gives the reader a candid picture of the real life struggles cancer places on not only the patient but their family and friends as well.
author: Ashley Hahn Calvery
